channel.title: Alex Tighe's Clips
channel.description: Hi, I make audio and I code. I built this podcast feed from scratch to showcase some podcast clips I've made and am proud of.
channel.itunes:author:
Alex Tighe https://tighebrary.io/images/Alex-Tighe.png
Left Right Out calls Emily Here's a clip from the #1 election podcast we made for Spotify. I've clipped a sequence from our final episode, which was a call-in episode: I arranged for some of our superfans to be available to take calls from the hosts, Elfy and Justine, to celebrate the show's run. This clip is heavily edited, although I hope you can't tell, and it's the best way I have of conveying the impact and popularity of a show we made from scratch. Wed, 09 Oct 2024 19:00:00 GMT
b99e0ef0-3e02-4dc3-a8dd-483d40f8ffb0
